name: electrodb
description: A library to more easily create and interact with multiple entities and heretical relationships in dynamodb

scripts.test:run: npm run test:types && npm run test:init && npm run test:unit
scripts.coverage: npm run test:init && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage:local:coveralls: npm run test:init && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage:local:html: npm run test:init && nyc npm run test:unit && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.ddb:load: docker compose exec electro npm run test:init
scripts.example:taskapp: npm run ddb:start && npm run ddb:load && ts-node ./examples/taskmanager/src/index.ts; npm run ddb:stop

author: Tyler W. Walch
